content: A self-titled album by what British rock band, known for their song "Bohemian Rhapsody", became popular among fans as the 'Black Album'?

I believe you're referring to the British rock band Queen and their self-titled album, often referred to as the "Black Album" due to its black cover design. This album was released in 1977 and features the iconic song "Bohemian Rhapsody," which has become one of their most recognized and beloved tracks. The "Black Album" is considered a classic in rock music history and continues to be popular among fans worldwide.
